title: Beautiful Villa for sale in Thalawathugoda
details:
Property is located in one of the best residential areas in Thalawathugoda town.

Wide access roads to the property and good frontage . Located just about 600m to the main road.

Peaceful location,uniquely designed house which can be used as 2 units if needed.

Solidly built house with unique features.

Details :

6 bedrooms with 5 attached bathrooms
Built in wardrobes for most of the rooms.

Entrance with a large living space
Dining space with a pantry
Laundry room
Entertainment room
Guest room with separate wash room
Dry wet kitchen
Drivers quarters
Over 7000 sqft ( Approx )
Ample car parking space

Beautiful large garden in front
Tennis court

Solid teak wood and Jack were used for the windows and doors of the house.

Solar hot water / Generator electric circuit/ Centrally wired TV and telephone system/ Emergency lighting system also installed.

It's a fantastic investment opportunity from one of the fastest developing areas close to Colombo.

Price : 100 Million ( Negotiable )

Inspections can be arranged only on prior appointments.
